title: About Angular
body: Creates a new array or string containing only a specified number of elements. The elements are taken from either the beginning or the end of the source array

title: TypesScript cool!!!!
body: TypeScript lets you write JavaScript the way you really want to. TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript. Any browser.

title: Pixi.js - 2D webGL renderer with canvas fallback
body: There are a host of other engines covering game, sound and physics etc. and they all work beautifully with Pixi.
